author: Jeremy B. White
title: California reopening could involve customer temperature checks, staggered class times
description: Businesses and schools will need to demonstrate their ability to maintain safe distancing guidelines.
content:
Sacramento | Rich Pedroncelli/AP Photo
OAKLAND Californias gradual reopening will depend on a series of public health benchmarks and the preparedness of schools and businesses, Gov. Gavin Newsom explained Tuesday as the state continues to make strong progres… [+2824 chars]
